text: Kevin McKenna (; 25 June 1945 â€“ 25 June 2019) was an Irish republican and volunteer in the Tyrone Brigade. He was the Chief of Staff of the Provisional Irish Republican Army (IRA). McKenna was the longest-serving chief of staff of the IRA, serving from 1983 to 1997. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Provisional Irish Republican Army
title: Kevin McKenna (Irish republican)
